title: The Silk Road
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Indian, International, Italian, Thai, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Asian, Caribbean, Catering, European, French, Fusion, German, Middle Eastern, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Tapas-style restaurant with seasonal selections from around the globe. The menu clearly marks vegan items, items that can be made vegan, dairy-free items, and gluten-free items. Wait staff was knowledgeable about what is vegan. Vegan catering is also available. As of Jan 2016, there are 4 completely vegan dishes, 1 vegan dessert, and 2 other options that can be made vegan.
